title: Players Flirt F-2610 Graphic Maple/Purple Tiger-Stripe with Black and Cream Points Pool Cue
features: Players Flirt cue butts are made thinner to fit a woman's hand better; this cue's sleek wrap less handle provides a smooth feel and uninterrupted stroke
Implex joint collar with 5/16 x 18 joint pin gives a firm hit
12.75mm premium Le Professional Le Pro tip This hard oak leather tip by Tweeten holds its shape longer and plays more uniform for more consistent play
Available in 18 - 21 ounces in half ounce increments
description: Players Flirt F-2610 graphic purple tiger-stripe maple cue with natural Maple, black and cream radiating point design, Implex joint collar, a thinner 12.75mm taper and sleek wrap less handle. This piece has an updated traditional look and would make a great playing cue for anyone from an amateur player practicing on a home table to a battle-tested tournament warrior. Intoxicating Power Sealed With A Kiss Why play with a cue that doesn't look as good as you do? Players Flirt cues are created for women, by women and are tailor-made to make you look - and play - your best. The women at Players are a diverse bunch and we demand top quality cues that we would be proud to show off at the pool hall. or in a tournament. We wont settle for any less and you shouldn't either. Players Flirt Features Full Players Cues quality Thinner cue butts made for smaller hands Slimmer (12.75mm) professional taper Custom etched butt stopper variety of wraps to choose from so you can get the feel you want Players pool cues are made from North American Grade A Hard Rock Maple that has been hand picked by seasoned craftsmen and turned and dried seven times during curing. The wood is treated with Nelsonite, a patented stabilizer that protects it from atmospheric changes and finished with an epoxy that seals the wood pores for even greater moisture protection.
